content: in the round i used a 32 circular needle and the magic loop technique but you can use a 9 circ 2 circs 3 flexi-flips 4 dpns or 5 dpns notions yarn needle locking stitch markers abbreviations bor beginning of round rhn right hand needle eor end of round round/rnds round/rounds k2tog knit two sts together st/sts stitch/stitches lhn left hand needle tbl through the back loop pu pick up pick up and knit dagrun s luggar norwegian cabin socks © 2023 by roxanne richardson page 2 of 6 jan 12 2023 dagrun s luggar norwegian cabin socks © 2023 by roxanne richardson page 3 of 6 jan 12 2023 instructions leg co 48 sts and join in the round work in k2p2 ribbing for about 6 /15 cm or desired length dagrun s sock leg was worked for 44 rounds heel note do not slip the selvedge stitch at the start of each row k26 turn p26 turn work these 26 sts back and forth for 10 more row 12 row total heel shaping place marker at midpoint of heel row 1 k to 3 sts before marker k2tog k2 slipping marker when you come to it k2tog k to end of heel sts alternatively work the decrease before the marker as an ssk to mirror the shaping row 2 purl work these two row again then work row 1 once more 6 sts decreased in total you should now have 20 heel sts on the needle ready to work a ws row next row purl to marker remove marker and stop keeping the purl side facing heel turn double bind off join the two halves of the heel will be bound off each needle alternately with the purl side facing the entire time bobble from left needle k2togtbl return stitch to left hand needle tighten the yarn do not turn work bobble from right needle k2togtbl return stitch to right hand needle tighten the yarn note special instructions below alternate between binding off a stitch from the left hand needle and right hand needle remembering to return the resulting stitch to the opposite needle and tightening the yarn each time until two sts remain don t strangle the yarn just give it a tug to pull out excess slack do not return the last resulting st to the right hand needle leave both on the left hand needle special instructions binding off from the right hand needle you will be knitting backwards off the rhn with the lhn acting as the working needle insert lhn through the backs of the first two sts on the rhn wrap the yarn counterclockwise around the lhn pull the new loop of yarn through the old sts see resources section for video tutorial link dagrun s luggar norwegian cabin socks © 2023 by roxanne richardson page 4 of 6 jan 12 2023 foot turn the work so that the rs faces and the needle with the 2 sts is in your right
